table_description: Artifacts allow you to share data between jobs in a workflow and store data once that workflow has completed.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: Full name of the repository that contains the artifact.

columns.name: size_in_bytes
columns.description: Size of the artifact in bytes.

columns.name: archive_download_url
columns.description: Archive download URL for the artifact.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Time when the artifact was created.

columns.name: expired
columns.description: It defines whether the artifact is expires or not.

columns.name: node_id
columns.description: Node where GitHub stores this data internally.
